Title: Jai Lava Kusa
Writer: Bobby Kolli (story & dialogue), K. Chakravarthy Reddy (screenplay), Sirasri (script coordinator), Kona Venkat (screenplay)
Actors: N.T. Rama Rao Jr., Raashi Khanna, Niveda Thomas, Brahmaji
Plot: Sidelined at a very young age due to his stammering disability, the eldest of identical triplets develops hatred for his younger brothers and creates havoc in their lives as they all reunite as adults.
